description:
After the conclusion to the battle against Northdin, everyone goes to the hot springs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La ville valse au bras du seigneur givré
Waltz with the Smiling Ice Lord in the Town of the Eternal, Continued / Fun Stupid Guys in Shin-Yokohama Special Ver.
Zoku: Tokoyo no Machi wa Hyoushoukyou to Waltz o Odoru / Shin-Yokohama no Tanoshii Bakayarou-tachi: Special Ver.
続・常世の町は氷笑卿とワルツを踊る / 新横浜の楽しいバカ野郎たち スペシャルver.
